<script>
  // Get the current page URL
var url = window.location.href;

// Parse the URL to get the path
var urlObject = new URL(url);
var path = urlObject.pathname;


var pathSegments = path.split("/");
var specificPath = pathSegments[1]; 

// Display the specific path
console.log("Specific path:", specificPath);

  
  // Check if the specific path is "knowledge-base"
if (specificPath === "knowledge") {
    // Create a link element for the CSS file
    var link = document.createElement("link");
    link.rel = "stylesheet";
    link.type = "text/css";
    link.href = "{{ get_asset_url('/Restaurant 2022/css/knowledge-pages.css') }}"; 
    // Append the link element to the head of the document
    document.head.appendChild(link);
} 
</script>

================================================================
Section Color With opacity

rgba({{ module.styles.line.color.color|convert_rgb }}, {{ module.styles.line.color.opacity / 100 }})

<div class="socialshare">
	<div class="socialcont">
	  <div>
		Share this post:
	  </div>
	  <a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u={{content.absolute_url }}" target="_blank">
<i class="fa fa-facebook"></i>
</a>
<a href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url={{content.absolute_url }}" target="_blank">
<i class="fa fa-twitter"></i>
</a>
<a href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?url={{content.absolute_url }}" target="_blank"> 
<i class="fa fa-linkedin"></i>
</a>
<a href="mailto:?body={{content.absolute_url }}" target="_blank"> 
<i class="fa fa-envelope"></i>
</a>



	</div>
	</div>

// Blog all post page

{% if request.path == '/blog/all' %}
{% global_partial path='../components/blog-all.html' %}
{% else %}
listing content
{% endif %}



// Template with sorting  

<!--
templateType: global_partial
label: Blog All posts
isAvailableForNewContent: false
-->

{% set sorting = request.query is string_containing "sort=name" ? 'name' : 'date' %}
{% set posts = sorting == "name" ? contents|sort(False, False, "name") : contents %} 


<section class="blog-all-posts">
<div class="content-wrapper">
<div class="heading-text">
  <h1 class="blog-all-posts__heading">All blog posts</h1>
</div>
<div class="blog-all-posts__sorting">
  <a href="/blog/all" class="item {{ sorting == 'date' ? 'active' : '' }}">Most recent</a>
  <a href="/blog/all?sort=name" class="item  {{ sorting == 'name' ? 'active' : '' }}">Alphabetical</a>
</div>

<div class="blog-all-main_wrap">
  <div class="inner-blog_posts_wrap">

	<div class="blog-all-posts__items">
	  {% for post in posts %}
	  <div class="blog-all-posts__item">
		<a href="{{ post.absolute_url }}">
		  {#  <span class="blog-all-posts__thumb"
			{% if post.featured_image %} data-bg='{{ resize_image_url(post.featured_image, 0, 50, 0) }}' {% endif %}
		  ></span> #}
		  <span class="blog-all-posts__thumb"><img src='{{ post.featured_image }}' alt="post-thumb-image" loading="lazy" height="32px" width="32px"></span>
		 
		  <span class="blog-all-posts__content">
			<span class="blog-all-posts__title">{{ post.name }}</span>
		  </span>
		</a>
	  </div>
	  {% endfor %}
	</div>

  </div>
</div>

<div class="cta-wrap text-center">
  <a href="/blog" class="c-cta-link reverse">Go to Blog</a>
</div>

</div><!-- .container -->
</section>

==========================================================
anchor id smooth scroll
$(document).ready(function() {
// Smooth scrolling for all anchor links
$('a[href^="#"]').on('click', function(event) {
	var target = $(this.getAttribute('href'));
	if( target.length ) {
		event.preventDefault();
		$('html, body').stop().animate({
			scrollTop: target.offset().top
		}, 1000);
	}
});
});

=======================================================

// Video popup
<div class="banner-botto-content play-btn__text-wrap">
<div class="banner-botto-content play-btn__text-wrap">
  <p>Or watch a 30-second video</p>
</div>

<div class="popup-video-main" style="display: none;">
  <div class="video-closeBtn">
	<svg width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40"><path d="M 10,10 L 30,30 M 30,10 L 10,30" stroke="black" stroke-width="4"></path></svg>
  </div>
  <div class="play-video">
	<video id="video" width="320" height="240" playsinline controls="">
	  <source src="https://www.growth.legal/hubfs/Growth%20Legal/video/03.04.2024_LGM%20Personal%20Injury_FINAL.mp4" type="video/mp4">
	  <source src="movie.ogg" type="video/ogg">
	  Your browser does not support the video tag.
	</video>
  </div>
</div>

$(document).ready(function(){
$(".play-btn__text-wrap").click(function(event){
 event.preventDefault();
$("body").addClass("show_pop__Up");
$(".popup-video-main").css("display", "block");
document.getElementById("video").play();
});

$(".video-closeBtn").click(function(){
$(".popup-video-main").hide();
$("body").removeClass("show_pop__Up");
document.getElementById("video").pause();
});
});
=================================================================

// Counter
var module_170959673683=function(){var count=0;$(document).scroll((function(){console.log("$(document).scrollTop()"+$(document).scrollTop()),console.log("ff"+$(".counter-main-wrap").position().top+$(".counter-main-wrap").outerHeight()),$(document).scrollTop()>=$(".counter-main-wrap").position().top-200&&$(document).scrollTop()<$(".counter-main-wrap").position().top+$(".counter-main-wrap").outerHeight()&&(console.log("cc"+count),0==count&&$(".stat-number").each((function(){var size=$(this).text().split(".")[1]?$(this).text().split(".")[1].length:0;$(this).prop("Counter",0).animate({Counter:$(this).text()},{duration:5e3,step:function(func){$(this).text(parseFloat(func).toFixed(size))}})})),count+=1,console.log("ccount"+count))}))}();

================================================================

// Hubspot video popup to play

($(".play-btn-text-wrap").click((function(){
$("body").addClass("open-popup-video"),
$(".video-popup").show(),
$(".popup-video-main").html($(".popup-video-text").html())})),
void $(".video-closeBtn").click((function(){
$(".popup-video-main").html(""),
$("body").removeClass("open-popup-video"),
$(".video-popup").hide()
}
)
)
);

===============================================================

// header-scroll sticky

<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
$(window).scroll(function(){
var $body = $("body");

var windowpos = $(window).scrollTop();
// console.log(windowpos);
if (windowpos > 0) {
$body.addClass("small-header");
} else {
$body.removeClass("small-header");	
}
});
});
</script>
========================================================================

//Add No-index in pages

<meta name="robots" content="noindex">

===================================================================
// popup
$('.popUp_therapeers').click(function() {
$(this).next('.therapeers_popUp--show').show();
$('body').addClass('show_therapeers-PoPUp');
});

$('.close-Btn').click(function(){
$(this).closest('.therapeers_popUp--show').hide();
$('body').removeClass('show_therapeers-PoPUp');
});



//body class not click on body div

$(document).ready(function() {
// Add event handler for button click
$('.btn').on('click', function(event) {
// Add class "active" to body
$('body').addClass('active');
// Prevent event bubbling to body
event.stopPropagation();
});

// Add event handler for body click
$('body').on('click', function(event) {
// Check if the clicked element is not the button or inside the button
if (!$(event.target).closest('.mobile_view-content').length) {
// Remove class "active" from body
$('body').removeClass('active');
}
});
});

================================================================


// Video Play and pause if multiple

var videos = document.getElementsByTagName('video');
for (var i = 0; i < videos.length; i++) {
videos[i].addEventListener('play', function() {
slider.slick('slickPause');
});
videos[i].addEventListener('pause', function() {
slider.slick('slickPlay');
});
videos[i].addEventListener('play', function(event) {
for (var j = 0; j < videos.length; j++) {
if (videos[j] !== event.target) {
videos[j].pause();
}
}
});
}

==============================================================

// Trasparent header after banner scroll
/** 
* Small Header on Page Scroll
*/
$(window).scroll(function(){
var $body = $("body");
var bannerHeight = $('.banner-section-outer').height(); // Assuming your banner has a class 'banner'

var windowpos = $(window).scrollTop();
console.log(windowpos);
if (windowpos > bannerHeight + 200) { // Adjusted condition to account for banner height
$body.addClass("small-header");
} else {
$body.removeClass("small-header");  
}
});



=====================================================================================

// header skip content hide and show
// Variables to track the number of times the Tab key has been pressed and whether the class has been added
var tabKeyPressCount = 0;
var classAdded = false;

$(document).on('keydown', function (e) {
// Check if the pressed key is the Tab key (key code 9)
if (e.which === 9) {
// Increment the counter
tabKeyPressCount++;

// Show the div on every Tab key press
$('.myDiv_header').show();

// Add the additional class after the second Tab key press
if (tabKeyPressCount === 2 && !classAdded) {
$('.myDiv_header').removeClass('myDiv_header');
$('#myDiv').addClass('additionalClass');
classAdded = true;
}

// Hide the element with the additional class
$('.additionalClass').hide();
}
});


//faq section
===================================================================================
function hsOnReadyLoadFAQ() { 
var $accordion = $('.accordion');

// Initially hide all accordion content
$accordion.find('.accordion_content').hide();
// Initially display the accordion content with .expanded class
$accordion.find('.accordion_group.expanded .accordion_content').show();

$accordion.find('.accordion_header').click(function(){

// Hide the displayed sibling accordion content so only one appears at a time
$accordion.find(".accordion_header").not(this).parent(".accordion_group.expanded").removeClass('expanded').children('.accordion_content').stop(true,true).slideUp();

if(!$(this).parent('.accordion_group').hasClass('expanded')){
// Display the accordion content if it is not displayed
$(this).parent(".accordion_group").addClass('expanded').children('.accordion_content').stop(true,true).slideDown();
}
else{
// Hide the accordion content if it is displayed
$(this).parent(".accordion_group").removeClass('expanded').children('.accordion_content').stop(true,true).slideUp();
}
});
} 

if (document.readyState === "complete" ||
(document.readyState !== "loading" && !document.documentElement.doScroll)
) {
hsOnReadyLoadFAQ();
} else {
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", hsOnReadyLoadFAQ);
}

=====================================================================================================================
// POST NEXT AND PREVIOUS

<div class="post-pagination">
<div class="prev-post">
{% if content.previous_post_slug %}
<div class="nav-text"><a href="/{{ content.previous_post_slug }}">Previous</a>
</div>
{% endif %}
</div>
<div class="next-post">
{% if content.next_post_slug %}
<div class="nav-text"><a href="/{{ content.next_post_slug }}">Next</a>
</div>
{% endif %}
</div>
</div>

{% dnd_section full_width="true" %}
{% dnd_column  offset=0,  width=12 %}
{% dnd_row %}
{% dnd_module  "module_16915715385887" path="/Budgetease Theme/modules/custom-modules/banner-module-with-menu", label="banner-module-with-menu" %}
{% end_dnd_module %}
{% end_dnd_row %}
{% end_dnd_column %}
{% end_dnd_section %}
============================================================================
// ADD CLASS ON SCROLL AND REMOVE

$(document).ready(function() {
// Function to add class on scroll
function addClassOnScroll() {
var scrollPosition = $(window).scrollTop();

if (scrollPosition > 0) {
$('body').addClass('scrolled');
} else {
$('body').removeClass('scrolled');
}
}

// Call the function on page load
addClassOnScroll();

// Call the function on scroll
$(window).scroll(function() {
addClassOnScroll();
});
}); 


// Target the "Login" menu item by its href value
var $loginMenuItem = $('a[href="https://secure.winkreports.com/accounts/sign-in"]');

// Add the class to the "Login" menu item
$loginMenuItem.addClass('mobile-login-btn');


=====================================================================================================	
$(document).ready(function() {
var image1 = $('.btimg');
var w = 100;
var s = 2;
var scrollSpeed = 50;
var lastScrollTop = 0;

$(window).scroll(function() {
var scroll = $(this).scrollTop();
var scrollDifference = scroll - lastScrollTop;

if (scroll > 50) {
$("header").addClass("sticky");
$(".fullscreen-bg__video").addClass("hide");
$(".c-block").addClass("hide");
$(".banner").addClass("scroll");
} else {
$("header").removeClass("sticky");
$(".fullscreen-bg__video").removeClass("hide");
$(".c-block").removeClass("hide");
$(".banner").removeClass("scroll");
}

if (scroll > 599) {
$(".banner").addClass("pos-fixed");
$('.bottom-full-icon').addClass("show");

// Decrease image size when scrolling down
w -= s;
if (w < 100) {
w = 100;
}
} else {
$(".banner").removeClass("pos-fixed");
$('.bottom-full-icon').removeClass("show");

// Increase image size when scrolling up
w += s;
if (w > 150) { // Set a maximum size if needed
w = 150;
}
}

image1.css({
'max-width': w + '%'
});

lastScrollTop = scroll;
});
});



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	

$(document).ready(function() {
var element = $('#element-to-move');

$(window).resize(function() {
if ($(window).width() <= 767) {
element.appendTo(".nn");
} else {
element.appendTo('body');
}
});

// Trigger the resize event on page load
$(window).resize();
});


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

<div id="element-to-move">Content to Move</div>


<div class="nn">
</div>

----------------------------------

@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
#mobile-location {
display: none;
}
}

step-{{ loop.index }}

{% cycle "odd","even" %}



==============================================================================================

// ACCORDION 

$('.accordion-header').click(function() {
let $this = $(this);
let $accordionItem = $this.closest('.accordion-item');

if ($this.next().hasClass('show')) {
$this.next().removeClass('show');
$this.next().slideUp();
$accordionItem.removeClass('active'); // Remove "active" class
} else {
$this.parent().parent().find('.accordion-content').removeClass('show');
$this.parent().parent().find('.accordion-content').slideUp();
$this.next().toggleClass('show');
$this.next().slideToggle();
$accordionItem.addClass('active'); // Add "active" class
}
});
==============================================================================================


$(document).ready(function(){
// Show the "scroll to top" button when user scrolls down
//   $(window).scroll(function() {
//     if ($(this).scrollTop() > 100) {
//       $('.scroll-top').fadeIn();
//     } else {
//       $('.scroll-top').fadeOut();
//     }
//   });

// Smooth scroll to top when the button is clicked
$('.scroll-top').click(function() {
$('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 800);
return false;
});
});




$(document).ready(function() {
$(".hs-item-has-children").click(function() {
if ($(this).hasClass("show")) {
$(this).removeClass("show");
} else {
$(".hs-item-has-children").removeClass("show");
$(this).addClass("show");
}
});
});

===============================================================================

// MOVE DIV WITH JQUERY TO ANTHOR DIV


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title>Move Div in Mobile View</title>
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<div id="container1">
<div id="myDiv">This is the div to move</div>
</div>

<div id="container2">
<!-- Empty container where we want to move 'myDiv' to in mobile view -->
</div>

<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
// Function to move the div based on screen width
function moveDivBasedOnScreenWidth() {
if ($(window).width() < 768) { // You can adjust this width as needed
$('#myDiv').appendTo('#container2');
} else {
$('#myDiv').appendTo('#container1');
}
}

// Call the function on page load
moveDivBasedOnScreenWidth();

// Call the function whenever the window is resized
$(window).resize(function() {
moveDivBasedOnScreenWidth();
});
});
</script>
</body>
</html>

<div class='sk-ww-linkedin-page-post' data-embed-id='193883'></div><script src='https://widgets.sociablekit.com/linkedin-page-posts/widget.js' async defer></script>

// ADD ACTIVE CLASS WITH JQUERY


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<!-- Include jQuery library -->
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
<style>
/* Define the CSS style for the active class */
.active {
font-weight: bold; /* You can customize this as per your needs */
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="blog-post-category-main">
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">All</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 1</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 2</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 3</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 4</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 5</a>
</div>
<div class="inner-single-category">
<a href="#" class="category-link">Category 6</a>
</div>
</div>

<script>
$(document).ready(function () {
// Retrieve the information about the clicked button from localStorage
var activeButton = localStorage.getItem("activeButton");

// Remove the "active" class from all category links
$(".category-link").removeClass("active");

// Add the "active" class to the category link corresponding to the clicked button
$("#" + activeButton).addClass("active");

// Clear the stored information from localStorage
localStorage.removeItem("activeButton");
});
</script>
</body>
</html>

=================================================================================
// Add class on window Load

<script>
$(window).on('load', function() {
$('body').addClass('loaded');
});
</script>


==========================================================================================

// ON MOBILE VIEW TO SCROLL TOP

<button id="scrollToTopBtn">Scroll to Top</button>


css: 
#scrollToTopBtn {
display: none; /* Initially hide the button */
}

/* Show the button only on mobile devices (you can adjust the max-width based on your target devices) */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
#scrollToTopBtn {
display: block;
position: fixed;
bottom: 20px;
right: 20px;
z-index: 9999;
}
}
js: 
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
<script>
// Add an event listener to the button using jQuery
$(document).ready(function() {
$('#scrollToTopBtn').on('click', function() {
// Scroll to the top of the page smoothly
$('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 'slow');
});
});
</script>

=========================================================================
=======
// ADD CLASS ON BODY IF PAGE IS OPEN IN MACBOOK


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title>MacBook Class Addition</title>
</head>
<body>

<script>
// Function to check if the user is on a MacBook
function isMacBook() {
return /Mac|iPod|iPhone|iPad/.test(navigator.platform);
}

// Function to add a class to the body element
function addClassToBodyIfMacBook() {
if (isMacBook()) {
document.body.classList.add('macbook');
}
}

// Call the function on page load
addClassToBodyIfMacBook();
</script>

</body>
</html>

==========================================================================

// ADD CLASS ON SCROLL

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title>Scroll to Add Class</title>
<style>
/* Some example styles */
body {
height: 2000px;
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
}
.box {
width: 100px;
height: 100px;
background-color: red;
position: fixed;
top: 50%;
left: 50%;
transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
body.scrolled {
background-color: blue;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="box"></div>

<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
// Function to add class on scroll
function addClassOnScroll() {
var scrollPosition = $(window).scrollTop();

if (scrollPosition > 0) {
$('body').addClass('scrolled');
} else {
$('body').removeClass('scrolled');
}
}

// Call the function on page load
addClassOnScroll();

// Call the function on scroll
$(window).scroll(function() {
addClassOnScroll();
});
});
</script>
</body>
</html>

====================================================================================
// TABBING WITH SLIDER

<div class="lawyan-module__tabbed-slider" data-aos="fade-up">
<div class="content-wrapper">
<div class="swiper-heading-button-outer">
<div class="heading-content">
{{ module.add_heading }}
</div>
<div class="swiper-button-outer">
<div class="swiper-button-prev"></div>
<div class="swiper-button-next"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="lawyan__tabbed-slider-main">
<div class="lawyan__tabbed-slider-outer">
<div class="lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__tabs">
{% for item in module.tab_repeater_section %}
<div class="tab card-shadow-m{% if loop.index == 1 %} active{% endif %}" data-tab-index="{{ loop.index }}">
{% if item.left_content_group.add_client_image.src %}
<div class="tab-image">
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.width }}" height="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.height }}"' %}
{% if item.left_content_group.add_client_image.size_type == 'auto' %}
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.width }}" height="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.height }}" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto;"' %}
{% elif item.left_content_group.add_client_image.size_type == 'auto_custom_max' %}
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.max_width }}" height="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.max_height }}" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto;"' %}
{% endif %}
{% set loadingAttr = item.left_content_group.add_client_image.loading != 'disabled' ? 'loading="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.loading }}"' : '' %}
<img src="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.src }}" alt="{{ item.left_content_group.add_client_image.alt }}" {{ loadingAttr }} {{ sizeAttrs }}>
</div>
{% endif %}
<div class="tab-name-state">
<div class="tab-name">{{ item.left_content_group.add_name }}</div>
<div class="tab-state">{{ item.left_content_group.add_state }}</div>
</div>
</div>
{% endfor %}
</div>
</div>
<div class="lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__slides-outer">
<div class="lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__slides">
<div class="swiper-container">
<div class="swiper-wrapper" id="swiper-wrapper-4d1a03ce29435361" aria-live="polite">
{% for item in module.tab_repeater_section %}
<div class="swiper-slide" data-swiper-slide-index="{{ loop.index - 1 }}" role="group" aria-label="{{ loop.index }} / 8" >
<div class="item">
<div class="body-heading-m item-title">
{{ item.right_content_group.title_content }}
</div>
<div class="item-star-image">
{% for item2 in item.right_content_group.rating_group %}
{% if item2.add_star_image.src %}
<div class="single-img">
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item2.add_star_image.width }}" height="{{ item2.add_star_image.height }}"' %}
{% if item2.add_star_image.size_type == 'auto' %}
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item2.add_star_image.width }}" height="{{ item2.add_star_image.height }}" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto;"' %}
{% elif item2.add_star_image.size_type == 'auto_custom_max' %}
{% set sizeAttrs = 'width="{{ item2.add_star_image.max_width }}" height="{{ item2.add_star_image.max_height }}" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto;"' %}
{% endif %}
{% set loadingAttr = item2.add_star_image.loading != 'disabled' ? 'loading="{{ item2.add_star_image.loading }}"' : '' %}
<img src="{{ item2.add_star_image.src }}" alt="{{ item2.add_star_image.alt }}" {{ loadingAttr }} {{ sizeAttrs }}>
</div>
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}
</div>
<div class="item-description">
{{ item.right_content_group.add_content }}
</div>
</div>
</div>
{% endfor %}
</div>
<div class="swiper-pagination swiper-pagination-clickable swiper-pagination-bullets"><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet swiper-pagination-bullet-active" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span><span class="swiper-pagination-bullet" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="Go to slide "></span></div>
<span class="swiper-notification" aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true"></span></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
{% require_js %}
<script>
//# sourceMappingURL=swiper-bundle.min.js.map
"use strict";

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
var tabbedSliders = 0;
$(".lawyan-module__tabbed-slider").each(function () {
tabbedSliders++;
$(this).find(".swiper-container").addClass("tabbed-slider-".concat(tabbedSliders));
var slider = new Swiper(".tabbed-slider-".concat(tabbedSliders), {
//         loop: true,
spaceBetween: 40,
mousewheel: false,
navigation: {
nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
},
pagination: {
el: '.swiper-pagination',
type: 'bullets',
clickable: true
}
});
var tabs = $(this).find(".tab");
tabs.each(function () {
$(this).on("click", function (event) {
event.preventDefault();
slider.slideToLoop($(this).data("tab-index") - 1);
tabs.removeClass("active");
$(this).addClass("active");
});
});
slider.on('slideChange', function (instance) {
tabs.removeClass("active");
tabs.filter("[data-tab-index='".concat(instance.realIndex + 1, "']")).addClass("active");
});
});
});

// Create a div to wrap the buttons
var buttonsWrapper = $('<div id="button-wrapper"></div>');

// Create the previous button
var prevButton = $('<div class="swiper-button-prev"></div>');

// Create the next button
var nextButton = $('<div class="swiper-button-next"></div');

// Append the buttons to the buttonsWrapper
buttonsWrapper.append(prevButton, nextButton);

// Append the buttonsWrapper to the .lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__slides-outer div
$('.lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__slides').append(buttonsWrapper);
</script>
{% end_require_js %}

.lawyan-module__tabbed-slider {

padding: 54px 0 108px;
position: relative;
margin-top: 125px;
}

position: absolute;
content: "";
background-image: url(https://lawyan.com/hubfs/Lawyan-2023/featured%20column%20shape.png);
width: 100%;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-position: top;
background-size: 100% 100%;
top: -112px;
left: 0;
height: 125px;
}

display: none;
}

.tab.card-shadow-m .tab-name-state *,
.item-description *,
.body-heading-m.item-title h4 {

}

align-items: center;

}

line-height:1;

align-items:center;

.item-star-image {
display: flex;
gap: 5px;
margin-bottom:33px;
}

font-size: 18px;
line-height: 30px;
}

font-size: 30px;
margin: 0 0 5px;
font-weight: 700;
line-height: 40px;
}

flex: 0 0 32.6%;
max-width: 32.6%;
}

flex: 0 0 60%;
max-width: 60%;
overflow-x: clip;
position: relative;
margin-top:25px;
}
.tab.card-shadow-m.active {

}
.tab.card-shadow-m + .tab.card-shadow-m {
margin-top: 10px;
}

.swiper-button-outer {
display: none !important;
}
#button-wrapper {
position: absolute;
top: 0;
right: 0;
width: 117px;
z-index: 999;
height: 51px;
margin-top: -150px;
z-index: 9999;
}
#button-wrapper .swiper-button-next::after {
content: "";
position: absolute;
background-image: url(https://20004591.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/20004591/Lawyan-2023/right-arrow-lawyan.png);
width: 42px;
height: 20px;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-size: contain;
background-position: center;
}

#button-wrapper .swiper-button-prev::after {
content: "";
position: absolute;
background-image: url(https://20004591.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/20004591/Lawyan-2023/right-arrow-lawyan.png);
width: 42px;
height: 20px;
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-size: contain;
background-position: center;
scale: -1;
}
#button-wrapper  .swiper-button-prev.swiper-button-disabled::after {
background-image: url(https://20004591.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/20004591/Lawyan-2023/right-arrow%20-lite%20lawyan.png);
scale: 1;
}
#button-wrapper .swiper-button-next.swiper-button-disabled::after {
background-image: url(https://20004591.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/20004591/Lawyan-2023/right-arrow%20-lite%20lawyan.png);
scale: -1;
}
/*** responsive ***/
@media (max-width:1199px){

flex: 0 0 28.6%;
max-width: 28.6%;
}
.tab-name {
font-size: 20px;
}
}


@media (max-width:991px){
.lawyan__tabbed-slider-outer {
flex: 0 0 33.6%;
max-width: 33.6%;
}
.tab-name {
font-size: 17px;
}
.tab-state {
font-size: 14px;
}
}

@media (max-width:767px){
.lawyan-module__tabbed-slider {
margin-top: 48px;
}
.lawyan-module__tabbed-slider::after {
height: 48px;
top: -43px;
}
.lawyan__tabbed-slider-main {
flex-direction: column;
align-items: normal;
gap: 50px;
}
.lawyan-module__tabbed-slider__slides-outer,
.lawyan__tabbed-slider-outer {
margin: 0;
flex: 0 0 100%;
max-width: 100%;
}
div#button-wrapper {
display: none;
}
}
</style>

// Add Active class

<ul class="filters">
<li data-filter="*" class="active">All</li>
<li data-filter="notcat" class="">Not Cat</li>
<li data-filter="cats" class="">Cats</li>
</ul>

$(document).ready(function() {
// Initially, set the "All" option as active
$(".filters li[data-filter='*']").addClass("active");

// Add click event handler to the list items
$(".filters li").click(function() {
// Remove the "active" and "show" classes from all list items
$(".filters li").removeClass("active");

// Add the "active" and "show" classes to the clicked list item
$(this).addClass("active");
});
});

{% if module.right_group.select_image.size_type == 'auto' %}

{% endif %}

<script>
$('document').ready(function()
{
$('.video-play-icon').click(function()
{
//console.log("ok");
$('.video-play-btn-sec').css('display','none');
$('.play-video').css('display','block');
const video = document.getElementById("video");
video.play();
});
});
</script>

// Stop click on link when href='javascript:;'

$(document).ready(function() {
$("a[href='javascript:;']").click(function(event) {
event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default link behavior
// Add your custom code here if needed
});
});

//Counter reduce days

<div class="outer-days-content">
<div class="outer-time-number">
<div class="inner-number">
<h2 id="days">48</h2>
</div>
<div class="inner-time-content">
<h3>
Days
</h3> 
</div>
</div>

<div class="outer-time-number">
<div class="inner-number">
<h2 id="hours">13</h2>
</div>
<div class="inner-time-content">
<h3>
Hours
</h3> 
</div>
</div>

<div class="outer-time-number">
<div class="inner-number">
<h2 id="minutes">4</h2>
</div>
<div class="inner-time-content">
<h3>
Minutes
</h3> 
</div>
</div>

<div class="outer-time-number">
<div class="inner-number">
<h2 id="seconds">50</h2>
</div>
<div class="inner-time-content">
<h3>
Seconds
</h3> 
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script>
(function () {
const second = 1000,
minute = second * 60,
hour = minute * 60,
day = hour * 24;

//I'm adding this section so I don't have to keep updating this pen every year :-)
//remove this if you don't need it
let today = new Date(),
dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, "0"),
mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, "0"),
yyyy = today.getFullYear(),
nextYear = yyyy + 1,
dayMonth = "12/25/",
birthday = dayMonth + yyyy;

today = mm + "/" + dd + "/" + yyyy;
if (today > birthday) {
birthday = dayMonth + nextYear;
}
//end

const countDown = new Date(birthday).getTime(),
x = setInterval(function() {    

const now = new Date().getTime(),
distance = countDown - now;

document.getElementById("days").innerText = Math.floor(distance / (day)),
document.getElementById("hours").innerText = Math.floor((distance % (day)) / (hour)),
document.getElementById("minutes").innerText = Math.floor((distance % (hour)) / (minute)),
document.getElementById("seconds").innerText = Math.floor((distance % (minute)) / second);
}, 0)
}());
</script>


// set date and time by own and stop counter after complition

$(document).ready(function () {
const second = 1000,
minute = second * 60,
hour = minute * 60,
day = hour * 24;

// Specify your target date in the format MM/DD/YYYY
let targetDate = new Date("11/12/2023 12:00AM");

const countDown = targetDate.getTime();
const x = setInterval(function() {    
const now = new Date().getTime();
const distance = countDown - now;

if (distance <= 0) {
// If time is completed, stop the counter
clearInterval(x);
// Optionally, you can do something when the countdown is completed
console.log("Countdown completed!");
} else {
$("#days").text(Math.floor(distance / day));
$("#hours").text(Math.floor((distance % day) / hour));
$("#minutes").text(Math.floor((distance % hour) / minute));
$("#seconds").text(Math.floor((distance % minute) / second));
}
}, 1000); // Update the countdown every second (1000 milliseconds)
});

"help_text": "Add Fun Image boolean. Default is ON.",
"display" : "toggle",
"type" : "boolean",
"default" : true
},
{
"label" : "Image",
"name" : "image_field",
"responsive" : true,
"resizable" : true,
"type" : "image",
"default" : {
"size_type" : "exact",
"src" : "https://4037193.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/4037193/hubfs/Christmas%20Theme/images/Landing%20page/hat.png?width=128&height=87&name=hat.png",
"alt" : "image-alt-text",
"loading" : "lazy"
}
}
]

// popup show
$(document).ready(function() {
$('a[href="#elementor-action"]').on('click', function(e) {
e.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default link behavior
$('body').addClass('popup-show');
});
$('#close-btn').click(function(){
$('body').removeClass('popup-show');
})
});

==============================================================================

Add class on page load (example in "hows-healthy blog")

<div class="tag_list_menu">
<div class="inner_single_tag">
{% set href = module.all_text_group.add_link.url.href %}
{% if module.all_text_group.add_link.url.type is equalto "EMAIL_ADDRESS" %}
{% set href = "mailto:" + href %}
{% endif %}
<a class="active" href="{{ href }}"
{% if module.all_text_group.add_link.open_in_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}
{% if module.all_text_group.add_link.rel %}rel="{{ module.all_text_group.add_link.rel }}"{% endif %}
>
{{ module.all_text_group.all_text }}
</a>
</div>
{% set my_tags = blog_tags(module.select_blog, 250) %}
{% for item in my_tags %}
<div class="inner_single_tag">
<a href="{{ blog_tag_url(group.id, item.slug) }}">{{ item.name }}</a>
</div>
{% endfor %}
</div>

$(document).ready(function(){
// Function to add the "active" class based on the current page URL
function setActiveClass() {
var currentPageURL = window.location.href;

// Remove the "active" class from all menu items
$('.tag_list_menu a').removeClass('active');

// Add the "active" class to the clicked menu item
$('.tag_list_menu a').filter(function() {
return this.href === currentPageURL;
}).addClass('active');

// If no menu item is active, add "active" class to the first menu item
if ($('.tag_list_menu a.active').length === 0) {
$('.tag_list_menu a:first').addClass('active');
}
}

// Add click event listener to all anchor tags inside the menu
$('.tag_list_menu a').on('click', function() {
// Remove the "active" class from all menu items
$('.tag_list_menu a').removeClass('active');

// Add the "active" class to the clicked menu item
$(this).addClass('active');
});

// Call the function on page load
setActiveClass();
});


===============================================================================

// On click to show input field pass

<div class="hs-form-field">
<label for="hs-reset-widget-password">Password*</label>
<a class="hs-reset-widget-show-password" href="javascript:show_password('hs-reset-widget-password');">Show password</a>
<input class="hs-input" name="password" type="password" placeholder="Password" id="hs-reset-widget-password">
</div>
<script>
$(document).ready(function () {
$(".hs-reset-widget-show-password:even").on("click", function (e) {
e.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default link behavior

var passwordInput = $("#hs-reset-widget-password");

// Toggle between 'password' and 'text' types
var currentType = passwordInput.attr("type");
var newType = (currentType === "password") ? "text" : "password";

passwordInput.attr("type", newType);
});
});
</script>

================================================================================
// Table of content with scroll active

let a;

class TableOfContents {
/* The parameters from and to must be Element objects in the DOM. */
constructor({ from, to }) {
this.fromElement = from;
this.toElement = to;
// Get all the ordered headings.
this.headingElements = this.fromElement.querySelectorAll("h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6");
// this.headingElements = this.fromElement.querySelectorAll("h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6");
this.tocElement = document.createElement("div");
}
/*
Get the most important heading level.
For example if the article has only <h2>, <h3> and <h4> tags
this method will return 2.
*/
getMostImportantHeadingLevel() {
let mostImportantHeadingLevel = 6; // <h6> heading level
for (let i = 0; i < this.headingElements.length; i++) {
let headingLevel = TableOfContents.getHeadingLevel(this.headingElements[i]);
// mostImportantHeadingLevel = (headingLevel < mostImportantHeadingLevel) ?
//  headingLevel : mostImportantHeadingLevel;
mostImportantHeadingLevel = (headingLevel < mostImportantHeadingLevel) ?
headingLevel : mostImportantHeadingLevel;
}
// console.log("mostImportantHeadingLevel"+mostImportantHeadingLevel);
return mostImportantHeadingLevel;
}
/*  Generate a unique id string for the heading from its text content.   */
static generateId(headingElement) {
return headingElement.textContent.replace(/\s+/g, "_");
}
/*  Convert <h1> to 1 … <h6> to 6.*/

static getHeadingLevel(headingElement) {
switch (headingElement.tagName.toLowerCase()) {
case "h1": return 1;
case "h2": return 2;
case "h3": return 3;
case "h4": return 4;
case "h5": return 5;
case "h6": return 6;
default: return 1;
}
}

generateToc() {
let currentLevel = this.getMostImportantHeadingLevel() - 1,
currentElement = this.tocElement;
// console.log("currentLevel"+currentLevel);
for (let i = 0; i < this.headingElements.length; i++) {
let headingElement = this.headingElements[i],
headingLevel = TableOfContents.getHeadingLevel(headingElement),
headingLevelDifference = headingLevel - currentLevel,
linkElement = document.createElement("a");
// console.log("headingLevel"+headingLevel);


if (!headingElement.id) {
headingElement.id = TableOfContents.generateId(headingElement);
// console.log("headingElement.id "+headingElement.id );
a = '#'+headingElement.id;
}
headingElement.id = headingElement.id.replace(/[&\/\\#, +()$~%.'":*?!<>{}]/g, '_');
linkElement.href = `#${headingElement.id }`;
linkElement.textContent = headingElement.textContent;

// console.log("headingLevelDifference"+headingLevelDifference);
if (headingLevelDifference > 0) {
// Go down the DOM by adding list elements.
for (let j = 0; j < headingLevelDifference; j++) {
let listElement = document.createElement("ul"),
listItemElement = document.createElement("li");
listElement.appendChild(listItemElement);
currentElement.appendChild(listElement);
currentElement = listItemElement;
}
currentElement.appendChild(linkElement);
} else {
// Go up the DOM.
for (let j = 0; j < -headingLevelDifference; j++) {
currentElement = currentElement.parentNode.parentNode;
}
let listItemElement = document.createElement("li");
listItemElement.appendChild(linkElement);
currentElement.parentNode.appendChild(listItemElement);
currentElement = listItemElement;
}

currentLevel = headingLevel;
}

this.toElement.appendChild(this.tocElement.firstChild);
}
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () =>
new TableOfContents({
from: document.querySelector(".article"),
to: document.querySelector(".table-of-contents")
}).generateToc()
);

$(document).ready(function(){
$(".table-of-contents ").addClass("oo_checking");
$(".table-of-contents ul").addClass("oo_checking");
$('.article h1,.article  h2,.article  h3,.article  h4,.article h5,.article h6').addClass('heading-list');
setTimeout(function(){

$(window).scroll(function() {
var windscroll = $(window).scrollTop();
if (windscroll >= 100) {
// console.log("okk");
$('.heading-list').each(function(i) {
// console.log("i"+i);
// The number at the end of the next line is how pany pixels you from the top you want it to activate.
if ($(this).position().top-150 <= windscroll - 0) {
var j = i+1;
$('.table-of-contents li').eq(1).addClass("ok");
$('.table-of-contents li.active').removeClass('active');

$('.table-of-contents li').eq(i).addClass('active');
$('.table-of-contents li a').eq(1).addClass("ok");
$('.table-of-contents  a.active').removeClass('active');

$('.table-of-contents  a').eq(i).addClass('active');
$('.heading-list.active').removeClass('active');
$('.heading-list').eq(i).addClass('active');
}
});
} else {
$('table-of-contents li').removeClass('active');
$('.table-of-contents li:first').addClass('active');
$('.table-of-contents li a').removeClass('active');
$('.table-of-contents li a:first').addClass('active');
}
}).scroll();

$("a[href^='#']").on("click", function(e) {
// console.log("ok"+$(this).attr("href"));
$("html, body").animate({
scrollTop: $($(this).attr("href")).offset().top-120
}, 1000);
return false;
});
$('.table-of-contents > ul').addClass("active-item");
}, 1000);

});
=========================================================

// number field flag : account: test account 1

// module: form flag: https://app.hubspot.com/design-manager/23401793/modules/165891057226?tfid=105919147656


<script>
//   form flag strat
$(window).on('load', function(){
//$(window).load(function(){
setTimeout(function() {
var selectedValue = $('.hs-fieldtype-phonenumber select').val();
//console.log(selectedValue);

$('.hs-fieldtype-phonenumber').prepend('<ul class="drop-down"><li class="active-lang"><a href="javascript:;" class="dropdown-toggle">Select Country</a><ul class="dropdown-menu"></ul></li></ul>');  

$('.hs-fieldtype-phonenumber select option').each(function(){
var thisval = $(this).val();
var thistext = $(this).text();
if(thisval){
$('.dropdown-menu').append('<li><a href="javascript:;" data-country="'+thisval+'" ><img alt="'+thisval+'" width="20" height="13" loading="lazy" src="https://23401793.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/23401793/flag/'+thisval+'.png"> <span>'+thistext+'</span></a></li>');
}
});


$('ul.dropdown-menu li').each(function(){
var country = $(this).find('a').attr('data-country');
//console.log(country);
if(country == selectedValue){
// console.log(country);
var counthryflag = $(this).find('a').html();
//console.log(counthryflag);
$('ul.drop-down li.active-lang a.dropdown-toggle').html(counthryflag);
}
});




var dropdownToggle = $('.dropdown-toggle');
var dropdownMenu = dropdownToggle.next('.dropdown-menu');
var dropdownItems = dropdownMenu.find('li');

// Toggle dropdown on click
dropdownToggle.click(function(e){
e.preventDefault();
dropdownMenu.slideToggle('fast');
});

// Handle click on dropdown item
dropdownMenu.on('click', 'li a', function(e){
e.preventDefault();
var countImage = $(this).html();
dropdownToggle.html(countImage);
dropdownMenu.slideToggle('fast');
var currentCountry = $(this).attr('data-country');
//console.log(currentCountry);
$('.hs-fieldtype-phonenumber select option').each(function(){
var selectcountry = $(this).val();
if (selectcountry == currentCountry ) {
$(this).val(currentCountry).change();
}
});
});

// Handle keyboard navigation
$(document).on('keydown', function(e) {
var activeItem = dropdownMenu.find('li a:focus');
var keyCode = e.keyCode || e.which;
switch(keyCode) {
case 38: // Up arrow
e.preventDefault();
if (activeItem.length) {
var prevItem = activeItem.parent().prev().find('a');
if (prevItem.length) {
prevItem.focus();
} else {
dropdownItems.last().find('a').focus();
}
} else {
dropdownItems.last().find('a').focus();
}
break;
case 40: // Down arrow
e.preventDefault();
if (activeItem.length) {
var nextItem = activeItem.parent().next().find('a');
if (nextItem.length) {
nextItem.focus();
} else {
dropdownItems.first().find('a').focus();
}
} else {
dropdownItems.first().find('a').focus();
}
break;
case 13: // Enter key
e.preventDefault();
if (activeItem.length) {
activeItem.trigger('click');
}
break;
default:
break;
}

// Add class to highlight selected item
dropdownItems.removeClass('selected');
dropdownMenu.find('li a:focus').parent().addClass('selected');
});

// Handle keyboard search
$(document).on('keypress', function(e) {
var char = String.fromCharCode(e.which);
dropdownItems.each(function() {
var text = $(this).text().toLowerCase();
console.log(text);
if (text.startsWith(char.toLowerCase())) {
$(this).find('a').focus();
return false; // Break the loop once a match is found
}
});
});

}, 500);
});
</script>
<style>
/* CSS for the dropdown */
.drop-down {
list-style-type: none;
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
}

.drop-down li {
display: block;
margin-right: 10px;
}

.drop-down li a {
text-decoration: none;
color: #000;
}

.drop-down li a:hover {
text-decoration: underline;
}

/* CSS for the dropdown menu */
.dropdown-menu {
height: 236px;
width: 300px;
overflow: scroll;
display: none;
position: absolute;
background-color: #f9f9f9;
min-width: 100px;
box-shadow: 0px 8px 16px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
padding: 12px 16px;
z-index: 1;
}
.hs-fieldtype-intl-phone select{
display:none;
} 
.dropdown-menu li a img{
height:20px;
width:20px;
}
.selected{
background-color:#ccc;
}
</style>

// slider logo smooth
<div class="logo-main scroller" data-speed="fast" data-animated="true">

<div class="logos_inner scroller__inner">
<div class="logo">
</div>
</div>

<div class="logos_inner scroller__inner--mobile">
<div class="logo">
</div>
</div>

</div>


<style>
.logo-main{padding:0;position:relative}.scroller__inner,.scroller__inner--mobile{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:60px}.logo-main.scroller .logos_inner{background-color:var(--primary_color)}.scroller[data-animated=true]{overflow:hidden}.scroller[data-animated=true] .scroller__inner{align-items:center;animation:scroll var(--_animation-duration,40s) var(--_animation-direction,forwards) linear infinite;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:max-content}.scroller[data-animated=true] .scroller__inner--mobile{align-items:center;animation:scroll var(--_animation-duration,40s) var(--_animation-direction,forwards) linear infinite reverse;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:max-content}.scroller[data-direction=right]{--_animation-direction:reverse}.scroller[data-direction=left]{--_animation-direction:forwards}.scroller[data-speed=fast]{--_animation-duration:25s}.scroller[data-speed=slow]{--_animation-duration:60s}.service-count-section .heading-count .count-text span{margin-left:10px}@keyframes scroll{to{transform:translate(calc(-50% - .5rem))}}.logo-slider-section .heading h3{font-family:Balto;font-size:32px;font-weight:400;line-height:41.6px;margin:0 0 27.73px;text-align:center}.logo-main.scroller .scroller__inner,.logo-main.scroller .scroller__inner--mobile{gap:76.53px}.scroller__inner .logo img,.scroller__inner--mobile .logo img{max-height:52.59px;width:auto}@media (max-width:767px){.logos_inner.scroller__inner--mobile{display:flex!important;margin-top:44.5px}}
</style>
<script>
const scrollers = document.querySelectorAll(".scroller");

// If a user hasn't opted in for recuded motion, then we add the animation
if (!window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches) {
addAnimation();
}

function addAnimation() {
scrollers.forEach((scroller) => {
// add data-animated="true" to every `.scroller` on the page
scroller.setAttribute("data-animated", true);

// Make an array from the elements within `.scroller-inner`
const scrollerInner = scroller.querySelector(".scroller__inner");
const scrollerContent = Array.from(scrollerInner.children);

// For each item in the array, clone it
// add aria-hidden to it
// add it into the `.scroller-inner`
scrollerContent.forEach((item) => {
const duplicatedItem = item.cloneNode(true);
duplicatedItem.setAttribute("aria-hidden", true);
scrollerInner.appendChild(duplicatedItem);
});
});
}

</script>

======================================================================
======================================================================
// Add class page section if multiple module same class

$(document).ready(function() {
// Select all divs with the class 'two-col-with-image-position'
var divs = $('.two-col-with-image-position');

// Check if there is a second div
if (divs.length >= 3) {
// Add the class to the second div
divs.eq(1).addClass('two-col__list__image');
}
});

===============================================================================
// Remove div if form submit

<!-- Custom JavaScript to handle form submission -->
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
function hideSecondDiv() {
document.getElementById('second-div').style.display = 'none';
}

// Use a MutationObserver to handle dynamic form rendering
var observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
	mutation.addedNodes.forEach(function(node) {
		if (node.nodeType === 1 && node.tagName === 'FORM') {
			node.addEventListener('submit', function() {
				hideSecondDiv();
			});
		}
	});
});
});

observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });
});
</script>



-==========================================================
slider hero left right on scroll

<div class="slider-container">
  <div class="slider-row" id="row-1">
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 1"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 2"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 3"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 4"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="slider-row reverse" id="row-2">
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 5"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 6"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 7"></div>
    <div class="slider-item"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/150" alt="Image 8"></div>
  </div>
</div>
<script>

let lastScrollTop = 0;

window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
  const scrollTop = window.scrollY;

  // Calculate movement based on scroll
  const move = scrollTop / 5; // Adjust divisor to change speed
  
  // Move rows in opposite directions
  document.getElementById('row-1').style.transform = `translateX(-${move}px)`;
  document.getElementById('row-2').style.transform = `translateX(${move}px)`;

  // Save current scroll position
  lastScrollTop = scrollTop;
});

</script>

=========================================================================================================
//   blog author hubspot


 {% if blog_author %}
    <div class="author-sec">
      <div class="hs-author-profile">
        <div class="hs-author-pic">
          {% if blog_author.avatar %} <div class="hs-author-avatar"> <img src="{{ blog_author.avatar }}" alt="{{ blog_author.display_name }}"> </div> {% endif %}
        </div>
        <div class="hs-author-name-and-bio">
          <div class="name-social-icon">
            <h1 class="hs-author-name">{{ blog_author.display_name }}</h1>
            <div class="hs-author-bio">{{ blog_author.bio }}</div>
            <div class="has_social_profiles">
              {% if blog_author.facebook %}  
              <a href="{{ blog_author.facebook }}" target="_blank" class="hs-author-social-link hs-social-facebook">
                <img  width="24px" height="24px" alt="facebook" src="https://mazeed.com/hubfs/facebook.svg"></a>
              {% endif %}
              {% if blog_author.twitter %}  
              <a href="{{ blog_author.twitter }}" target="_blank" class="hs-author-social-link hs-social-twitter">
                <img  width="24px" height="24px" alt="twitter" src="https://mazeed.com/hubfs/twitter.svg"></a>
              {% endif %}
              {% if blog_author.linkedin %}  
              <a href="{{ blog_author.linkedin }}" target="_blank" class="hs-author-social-link hs-social-linkedin">
                <img  width="24px" height="24px" alt="linkedin" src="https://mazeed.com/hubfs/linkedin.svg"></a>
              {% endif %}
              <p class="link-text" id="link-text" style="display:none;">

              </p>
              {% if blog_author.website %}
              <a href="{{ blog_author.website }}" target="_blank" class="hs-author-social-link hs-social-website">
                <img alt="website" width="24px" height="24px" src="https://mazeed.com/hubfs/site.png">
              </a>
              {% endif %}
            </div>
          </div>


        </div>



      </div>
    </div>
    {% else %}
